text: Barney (Bernard, September 30, 2000 - February 1, 2013) was the pet of George W. Bush and for Laura Bush. He was a Scottish Terrier. He had a nickname "The First Dog". On Christmas Days, he recorded all the activities held on the White House, which was called Barney Cam. He was born in New Jersey on September 30, 2000. Barney died on February 1, 2013 from lymphoma in Texas. ==References== ==Other websites== * Barney's official site -- archived copy of George W. Bush White House site Category:2000 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:George W. Bush Category:United States presidential dogs
title: Barney (dog)
